channel.title: No-Ip and Experience and other stuff
channel.description:
1. Okay, there's probably a guide somewhere but I can't find. How do I set up a No-IP?
2. How do I change the experience gained when you are attacking an NPC?
3. How do I make a downloadable client?
There's proably guides but I can't find them. If there is please post links.
